title: paripUraNAnanda
sahitya:
paripUraNAnanda sukhavAri tannai nAn parugum oru varam aruLvAi


anupallavi

  parivAna guruvAgip-pashu pAsha vinai tIrap-parishittup-padiyarivai darishikkum phalanIndu


caraNam    dEhtma bandhamara mOhAdi dondamara sAgAda kalai kaNDu nOghAda nilai viNDu
yOgattilE parama bhOgattilE shakti vEgattilE hrdaya dAham taNindiDavE
